ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Dredd sneaks into the Hall of Justice and executes judgement on Chief Judge Griffin and gets his confession live on-air during 'Curfew Talk' before turning the gun on himself.
A damaged Bagman empties himself all over the battlefield, coming back to himself when Rogue uses him to block a bayonet thrust.
